scripts.lint:server: cd src/abb-server && npm run lint && cd ../../
scripts.lint:web: cd src/abb-web && npm run lint && cd ../../
scripts.format:server: cd src/abb-server && npm run format && cd ../../
scripts.format:web: cd src/abb-web && npm run format && cd ../../

*.{ts,tsx,js,jsx}: npm run lint:server && npm run lint:web
*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx,css,scss,html}: npm run format:server && npm run format:web
